titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the King on the 30th of January, 1684/5 being the fast for the martyrdom of King Charles the first of blessed memory / by Francis Lord Bishop of Ely, and Almoner to His Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Turner, Francis, 1638?-1700.
